FuncDef:
The pki realm command creates a PKI realm and displays the PKI realm view, or displays the view of an existing PKI realm.
The undo pki realm command deletes a PKI realm. The pki realm command creates a PKI realm and displays the PKI realm view, or displays the view of an existing PKI realm. The undo pki realm command deletes a PKI realm. By default, there is a PKI realm named default in the system, and this realm can be modified but cannot be deleted.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a PKI domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters without spaces, question marks (?), and slashes (/).

ExtraInfo: A PKI realm is a set of identity information required when a PKI entity enrolls a certificate.
